# 开悟之门

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/kaiwu-zhimen
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/kaiwu-zhimen
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install kaiwu-zhimen
kaiwu-zhimen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g kaiwu-zhimen
kaiwu-zhimen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
